lom:description.lom:string: This Commitee was chartered by the MIT Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science to examine the perceived imbalance in male and female undergraduate enrollment at MIT, to get some sense of the reasons for this (in particular whether these factors are internal to MIT), and to suggest steps that might be taken to improve the balance.

lom:title.lom:string: Women Undergraduate Enrollment in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at MIT
